query:
CREATE TABLE `locations` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`createdBy` int NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT `locations_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2FYRcYGi4pb6onw.cb424ff095fe --database Rjwg2XpN7AjHEkC6dWznWM --execute CREATE TABLE `locations` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`createdBy` int NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT `locations_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
